mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM class WHERE class_isDeleted='N'
Select Count(*) as Total From Class where sub_code=#{code} AND class_isDeleted='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class (class_no,sub_code,mem_id,mem_nick,class_title,class_body) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(class_no), 0) + 1 FROM class),#{code},#{id},#{nick},#{title},#{body})
mapper.select: SELECT class_no AS no, s.sub_name AS code, class_title AS title, mem_nick AS nick, class_date AS wdate, class_good AS good, class_hit as hit FROM class c,subject s where C.SUB_CODE = S.SUB_CODE AND class_isDeleted='N' ORDER BY no DESC

SELECT class_no AS no, s.sub_name AS code, class_title AS title, mem_nick AS nick, class_date AS wdate, class_good AS good, class_hit AS hit FROM class c,subject s where C.SUB_CODE = S.SUB_CODE and C.SUB_CODE = #{code} AND class_isDeleted='N' ORDER BY no DESC

SELECT class_no AS no, class_title AS title, class_body AS body, mem_id AS id, mem_nick AS nick, class_date AS wdate, s.sub_name AS code, class_lang AS lang, class_hit AS hit, class_good as good FROM class c,subject s where class_no = #{NO} AND s.sub_code = C.SUB_CODE
SELECT video_no AS mediaNO, video_url AS mediaURL FROM class_no = #{NO}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM class WHERE class_no = #{NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE class SET title = #{title}, body = #{body}, date = SYSDATE WHERE class_no = #{NO}
UPDATE class SET isDeleted = 'Y' WHERE class_no = #{NO}
